verblex: 1. To make something behave exactly as you want. English = control.
2. To make the different people and things involved in an activity work together properly and efficiently. English = coordinate.
nomlex: 1. The ability to make something behave exactly as you want. English = control.
2. A person who organises the people taking part in a project or activity and makes sure they work together properly and efficiently. English = coordinator.
